newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Mauritius foreign minister to visit Sri Lanka.
newsitem.headline: Mauritius foreign minister to visit Sri Lanka.

text.p: Mauritius Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Affairs Minister Paul Raymond Berenger will visit Sri Lanka from April 10-13, the Foreign Ministry said on Monday.
Berenger, the current chairman of the Indian Ocean Rim Association for Regional Co-operation, will hold talks with Foreign Minister Lakshman Kadirgamar, the ministry said in a statement.
The Mauritian minister will also call on Sri Lankan Prime Minister Sirima Bandaranaike, Justice Minister G.L. Peiris and opposition leader Ranil Wickremesinghe, it said.
